Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to certain charges for advanced metering infrastructure for water-works corporation services
Summary: Provides that every customer of a water-works corporation, at no penalty, fee or service charge to decline the permission of the water-works corporation to replace an existing meter at such customer's premises that is assigned to such customer's account.
LawCode: Add ยง89-q, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to certain charges for advanced metering infrastructure for water-works corporation services
